title: pallANDu pallANDu pallAyira
sahitya:
pallANDu pallANDu pallAyirattANDu vAzhga nI bhAratat-tAi


anupallavi

  ellA vaLangaLum ellA varangaLum Ind-ulaguittiDavE


caraNam 1    un maNi mArb-amuduNDa kuzhandaigaL unniccaikkE uyirppOm
unnAtma shaktiyAl innal ellAm tIra ulagai venrisai peruvOm
    caraNam 2    paTralar naDungiDa bandhangaL sindiDap-parama sutantararAi
oTrumai koNDingE Or kula makkaLAi Ongak-karuNai sheidAi Om shakti
